Keywords: Robot , Sentinel
Real Name: None
Special Powers
PRIME DIRECTIVE: At the beginning of your turn, Sentinel Mark V may move 1 square. If an opposing character with the X-Men or Brotherhood of Mutants keyword is on the map, they may move 1 additional square.
HUNTER KILLER: When Sentinel Mark V KO's a character, after resolutions heal it 1 click. Once per game, if the KO'd character has either the Brotherhood of Mutants or X-Men keyword or team ability, modify its combat values by +1 this game.
ANALYZE AND CONTAIN: Running Shot, Plasticity. // Opposing characters within 3 squares and line of fire must break away as if they were adjacent to Sentinel Mark V.
FRIGI-BEAM: When Sentinel Mark V hits with a ranged attack, hit characters are given an action token and gain IMMOBILE until your next turn. If a hit character can't be given an action token, after resolutions deal them 1 penetrating damage.
Linked Units
